#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<iomanip>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int x11,x12,x21,x22,y11,y12,y21,y22;
        cin>>x11>>y11>>x12>>y12;
        cin>>x21>>y21>>x22>>y22;
        int area=(x12-x11)*(y12-y11);
        area+=(x22-x21)*(y22-y21);
        int x31,x32,y31,y32;
        if(x11>x21)
        {
            x31=x11;
        }
        else
            x31=x21;
        if(x12>x22)
            x32=x22;
        else
            x32=x12;
        if(y11>y21)
        {
            y31=y11;
        }
        else
            y31=y21;
        if(y12>y22)
            y32=y22;
        else
            y32=y12;

        if(x32-x31>0&&y32-y31>0)
            area-=(x32-x31)*(y32-y31);
        cout<<area<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
